modules.description: Handles secure socket connections with custom protocol initialization and request processing. Operates on socket addresses and protocol types, supporting ALPN protocol negotiation and certificate-based authentication. Used to establish HTTPS servers with tailored request handling and upgradable protocol support.

Handles secure socket creation and management with support for protocol upgrades and shutdowns. Operates on socket types constrained to network address representations. Used to establish encrypted connections and manage their lifecycle in networked applications.

Provides functions to establish and manage TLS connections, including creating a TLS context with a specified protocol, upgrading an existing socket to use TLS, and shutting down the connection gracefully. Operates on socket types constrained to network address types and TCP sockets. Used to secure communication over a network by wrapping unencrypted sockets with TLS encryption.

Establishes secure, protocol-aware socket servers with support for ALPN and certificate-based authentication. Processes custom protocol initialization and request handling using socket addresses and protocol configurations. Enables HTTPS server creation with upgradable protocol capabilities. Examples include setting up a TLS-secured web server with custom request routing and protocol upgrades like HTTP/2.

Manages secure network communication through socket creation, TLS encryption, and connection lifecycle control. Supports operations like protocol-specific context setup, socket upgrades to TLS, and graceful shutdowns. Works with network address types and TCP sockets to enable encrypted data transfer. Can be used to establish secure channels, upgrade existing connections, and ensure safe termination of network sessions.

Provides functions for managing protocol state transitions and handling protocol upgrades in network applications. Works with connection states, protocol headers, and stream data to facilitate seamless protocol switching. Used to implement HTTP/1.1 to Websocket upgrades and initiate HTTP/2 over plaintext TCP.

Provides secure, protocol-aware network communication by establishing TLS-secured servers, handling protocol initialization, and managing connection lifecycles. Supports ALPN, certificate-based authentication, and protocol upgrades, with operations on socket addresses, TCP connections, and TLS contexts. Enables creation of HTTPS servers with custom routing and secure channel establishment. Examples include setting up an HTTP/2 server with TLS and gracefully shutting down encrypted connections.
